name: Wei Lu 0015
content: Lu Wei's Home Page Lu Wei (å¢å«) Associate Professor 501a, Information Building Key Laboratory of Data Engineering and Knowledge Engineering, Ministry of Education Renmin University of China, Beijing, 100872 Email: lu-wei[at]ruc.edu.cn SDMA 2017 Short Biography Research Interests Publications Services Awards Short Biography Dr. Lu Wei is an associate professor of Computer Science Department at Renmin University. Before joining Renmin University, Dr. Lu worked as a research follow of Computer Science Department at NUS during July, 2011 to Sept. 2014. He was a research assistant of DKE group at university of Queesland, Australia during Dec. 2007 to Dec. 2008 and of Database group at National University of Singapore, during June, 2010 to Dec. 2010. Dr. Lu got his Ph.D degree from Renmin University, Master and Bachelor Degrees from both China University of Geoscience (Beijing). Research Interests Data Mining and Big Data Analysis Cloud database systems Spatial and textual data management Mining social network and social media Selected Publications Conferences Chuitian Rong, Chunbin Lin, Yasin N.
